365620.name: WarBirds 2026
365620.description:
WarBirds 2026 is both an MMO and Single Player Combat Flight Simulation and aerial shooter. This is a game where flying skill matters. It is not an arcade shooter. Fly well and survive. Fly poorly and you will be called "target."

Whether flying solo or joining online squadrons, WarBirds 2026 offers deep, realistic World War II combat across air, land, and sea. With over 30 years of development, WarBirds 2026 continues to set the standard for historical accuracy in flight simulation. (WarBirds 2026 also has both WWI Aerial Combat and WW II Tanks battles to participate in both as a Single Player game and as an MMO).

The new WarBirds 2026 has recent updates including a brand-new User Interface, better graphics, and improved player controls.

 

Choose between:

  • Solo Missions: Detailed training modules and 12 instant action missions like Bomber Ambush and Rear Gunner. 

  • Free Flight Mode: Practice across 5 combat scenarios and 20 plus terrains.

  • Online Mode: Play Online FREE Forever with Six Early World War II Vehicles. If you want access to over 225 historical Fighters, Bombers, Tanks, and Transport vehicles, with over 400 distinct Skins/Paint Schemes, a monthly $13.95 subscription is required.  

  • The WarBirds 2026 Events Team holds Online Historical events most Sundays, September to June, at 2030 Hrs, New York City time.

  • Recently the Battle of Britain, Battle of Coral Sea Events have been held.  The Burna Campaign and the Battle of the Bulge Events are coming soon.

  • WarBirds 2026 also includes both WWI Aerial Combat and WW II Tanks battles to participate in both as a Single Player game and as an MMO.

 

Unlock and pilot over 225 historically accurate WWII aircraft and ground vehicles, including fighters, bombers, tanks, and transports. Each unit features distinct flight characteristics and combat behavior for a truly immersive experience.

Start with Cadet training, climb the ranks, earn medals, and aim for the elite title of World's Greatest Fighter Pilot (WGFP).

Experience scripted missions and multiplayer campaigns based on legendary battles:

  • Battle of Britain

  • Pearl Harbor

  • Midway

  • B-17s over Europe

  • And More

 

WarBirds 2026 is a true simulation, not an arcade game. Every aircraft is meticulously modelled. You will need to master realistic flight physics, engine management, and WWII tactics to survive.

New features in WarBirds 2026 include:

  • Completely revamped User Interface

  • Upgraded graphics and effects

  • Improved controller and flight support

  • First 4 Weeks Free: Access the full suite of aircraft and features.

    • After that, keep playing for free with six early war vehicles like the Spitfire Mk. IIa, Me-109E-3, Ju-52, Do-17, Wellington Mk. 1C , and M4A1 Sherman,

Want more? Subscriptions unlock full access again to over 400 accurate and historical Squadron Paint Schemes, over 500 different vehicles, and all the Ammo and Fuel you need!

Join the Community

  • Train with real pilots in Thursday night sessions

  • Join a Squadron to participate in organized raids

  • Compete for honors and ranks

  • Full access to Discord voice chat and community support
365620.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
